desc: Cacao Breath offers ceremonial grade, heirloom cacao that is combined with Maya nut, an untapped superfood that grows in the same ecosystem as cacao, thus, these two plants are synergists. This blend comprises our unique chocolate product.

layout.text:
DRINK CHOCOLATE
GLOW
CREATE
just 2 ingredients:
Heirloom Cacao from Ecuador
Wild harvested Maya Nut from Guatemala
